column2: Accessway runs parallel to previously generated chamber(s) or corridor(s) for a short distance, with hidden openings into each of those spaces; roll again on this table; if no previously generated corridors or chambers are mapped nearby, use result 10-15
Accessway extends a short distance; roll again
Accessway drops into reclamation pit containing a level 5 deconstructor automaton
Accessway narrows to 4 inches (10 cm) in height and width; roll again
Accessway runs a short distance and comes to a T intersection; roll on this table for each branch
